sentence: Depending on the circumstance, Apple may rely on your consent or the fact that the processing is necessary to fulfill a contract with you, protect your vital interests or those of other persons, or to comply with law.
label: None

sentence: We may also process your personal data where we believe it is in our or others’ legitimate interests, taking into consideration your interests, rights, and expectations.
label: None

sentence: If you have questions about the legal basis, you can contact the Data Protection Officer at apple.com/legal/privacy/contact.
label: None

sentence: Power Our Services.
label: None

sentence: Apple collects personal data necessary to power our services, which may include personal data collected to personalize or improve our offerings, for internal purposes such
label: None

sentence: as auditing or data analysis, or for troubleshooting.
label: None

sentence: For example, if you would like to access a song through an Apple Music subscription, we collect data on what songs you play in order to provide you with the content requested and for royalty purposes.
label: None

sentence: Process Your Transactions.
label: None

sentence: To process transactions, Apple must collect data such as your name, purchase, and payment information.
label: None

sentence: Communicate with You.
label: None

sentence: To respond to communications, reach out to you about your transactions or account, market our products and services, provide other relevant information, or request information or feedback.
label: None

sentence: From time to time, we may use your personal data to send important notices, such as communications about purchases and changes to our terms, conditions, and policies.
label: None

sentence: Because this information is important to your interaction with Apple, you may not opt out of receiving these important notices.
label: None

sentence: Security and Fraud Prevention.
label: None

sentence: To protect individuals, employees, and Apple and for loss prevention and to prevent fraud, including to protect individuals, employees, and Apple for the benefit of all our users, and prescreening or scanning uploaded content for potentially illegal content, including child sexual exploitation material.
label: None

sentence: Comply with Law.
label: None

sentence: To comply with applicable law — for example, to satisfy tax or reporting obligations, or to comply with a lawful governmental request.
label: None

sentence: Apple does not use algorithms or profiling to make any decision that would significantly affect you without the opportunity for human review.
label: None

sentence: Apple retains personal data only for so long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including as described in this Privacy Policy or in our service-specific privacy notices, or as required by law.
label: None

sentence: We will retain your personal data for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy and our service-specific privacy summaries.
label: None

sentence: When assessing retention periods, we first carefully examine whether it is necessary to retain the personal data collected and, if retention is required, work to retain the personal data for the shortest possible period permissible under law.
label: None

sentence:
Apple’s Sharing of Personal Data

Apple may share personal data with service providers who act on our behalf, our partners, or others at your direction.
label: None

sentence: Further, Apple does not share personal data with third parties for their own marketing purposes.
label: None

sentence: Service Providers.
label: None

sentence: Apple may engage third parties to act as our service providers and perform certain tasks on our behalf, such as processing or storing data, including personal data, in connection with your use of our services and delivering products to customers.
label: None

sentence: Apple service providers are obligated to handle personal data consistent with this Privacy Policy and according to our instructions.
label: None

sentence: They cannot use the personal data we share for their own purposes and must delete or return the personal data once they've fulfilled our request.
label: None

sentence: At times, Apple may partner with third parties to provide services or other offerings.
label: None

sentence: For example, Apple financial offerings like Apple Card and Apple Cash are offered by Apple and our partners.
label: None

sentence: Others.
label: None

sentence: Apple may share personal data with others at your direction or with your consent, such as when we share information with your carrier to activate your account.
label: None

sentence: We may also disclose information about you if we determine that for purposes of national security, law enforcement, or other issues of public importance, disclosure is necessary or appropriate.
label: None

sentence: We may also disclose information about you where there is a lawful basis for doing so, if we determine that disclosure is reasonably necessary to enforce our terms and conditions or to protect our operations or users, or in the event of a reorganization, merger, or sale.
label: None

sentence: If you purchase a third-party subscription from the App Store or within Apple News, we create a Subscriber ID that is unique to you and the developer or publisher.
label: None

sentence: The Subscriber ID may be used to provide reports to the developer or publisher, which include information about the subscription you purchased and your country of residence.
label: None

sentence: If you cancel all of your subscriptions with a particular developer or publisher, the Subscriber ID will reset after 180 days if you do not resubscribe.
label: None

sentence: This information is provided to developers or publishers so that they can understand the performance of their subscriptions.
label: None

sentence:
Protection of Personal Data at Apple

At Apple, we believe that great privacy rests on great security.
label: None

sentence: We use administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal data, taking into account the nature of the personal data and the processing, and the threats posed.
label: None

sentence: We are constantly working to improve on these safeguards to help keep your personal data secure.
label: None

sentence: For more information, visit our Apple Platform Security guide.
label: None

sentence:
Children and Personal Data

Apple understands the importance of safeguarding the personal data of children, which we consider to be an individuals under the age of 13 or the equivalent age as specified by law in your jurisdiction.
label: None

sentence: That is why Apple has implemented additional processes and protections to help keep children's personal data safe.
label: None

sentence: To access certain Apple services, a child must have a child Apple ID.
label: None

sentence: A child Apple ID may be created by the parent or, in the case of a Managed Apple ID, by the child's educational institution.
label: None

sentence: To create a child account, parents must review the Family Privacy Disclosure for Children, which describes
label: None

sentence: how Apple handles children's personal data.
label: None

sentence: If they agree, the parent must provide Apple with a verifiable parental consent.
label: None

sentence: Educational Institutions.
label: None

sentence: Educational institutions that participate in the Apple School Manager Program may also create Apple IDs for students, called "Managed Apple IDs.
label: None

sentence: ” These schools are required to agree to the Managed Apple IDs for Students Disclosure which is included as Exhibit A to the Apple School Manager Agreement.
label: None

sentence: If we learn that a child's personal data was collected without appropriate authorization, it will be deleted as soon as possible.
label: None

sentence: To exercise privacy rights for your child's information, visit the Apple Data and Privacy page at privacy.apple.com and sign in to their account.
label: None

sentence:
Cookies and Other Technologies

Apple’s websites, online services, interactive applications, and advertisements may use “cookies” and other technologies such as web beacons.
label: None

sentence: These technologies help us to better understand user behavior including for security and fraud prevention purposes, tell us which parts of our websites people have visited, and facilitate and measure the effectiveness of advertisements and web searches.
label: None

sentence: Communications Cookies.
label: None

sentence: These cookies are used to enable network traffic to and from Apple’s systems, including by helping us detect any errors.
label: None

sentence: Strictly Necessary Cookies.
label: None

sentence: These cookies are set as required to provide a specific feature or service that you have accessed or requested.
label: None

sentence: For example, they allow us to display our websites in the proper format and language, to authenticate and verify your transactions, and to preserve the contents of your Bag when shopping online at apple.com.
label: None

sentence: Other Cookies.
label: None

sentence: These cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with our websites and online services, including by helping us to assess the effectiveness of advertisements and web searches.
label: None

sentence: Apple also uses these cookies to remember choices you make while browsing, so we can provide you with a customized experience.
label: None

sentence: If you prefer that Apple not use cookies, we provide you with the means to disable their use.
label: None

sentence: If you want to disable cookies and you’re using the Safari web browser, choose “Block all cookies” in Safari’s privacy settings.
label: None

sentence: If you are using a different browser, check with your provider to find out how to disable cookies.
label: None

sentence: Certain features of the Apple website may not be available if all cookies are disabled.
label: None

sentence: In addition to cookies, Apple uses other technologies that help us achieve similar objectives.
label: None

sentence: In some email messages Apple sends to you, we provide a “click-through URL” that links you to content on the Apple website.
label: None

sentence: When you click one of these URLs, they pass through a separate server before arriving at the destination page on our website.
label: None

sentence: We track this click-through to help us determine interest in particular topics and measure whether we are communicating with you effectively.
label: None

sentence: If you prefer not to be tracked in this way, you should not click graphic or text links in email messages.
label: None

sentence: Apple generally treats data we collect using these cookies and similar technologies as nonpersonal data.
label: None

sentence: However, to the extent that Internet Protocol (IP) addresses or similar identifiers are considered personal data by local law, we also treat these identifiers as personal data in those regions.
label: None

sentence: In addition, Apple sometimes combines nonpersonal data collected from these technologies with other personal data Apple holds.
label: None

sentence: When we combine data in this way, we treat the combined data as personal data for purposes of this Privacy Policy.
label: None

sentence: Ads that are delivered by Apple’s advertising platform may appear in Apple News, Stocks, or in the App Store.
label: None

sentence: If you do not want to receive ads targeted to your interests from Apple's advertising platform in those apps, you can choose to disable Personalized Ads, which will opt your Apple ID out of receiving such ads regardless of what device you are using.
label: None

sentence: On your iOS or iPadOS device, you can disable Personalized Ads by going to Settings > Privacy > Apple Advertising and tapping to turn off Personalized Ads. On your Mac, you can disable
label: None

sentence: Personalized Ads by choosing Apple menu > System Preferences > Security & Privacy, clicking Privacy, clicking Advertising, and deselecting Personalized Ads.
label: None

sentence: You may still see ads in the App Store, Apple News, or Stocks based on context like your search query or the channel you are reading.
label: None

sentence: If you disable Allow Apps to Request to Track, third-party apps cannot request to use the Advertising Identifier, a non personal identifier served by the operating system on your device, to track you across apps and websites owned by other companies.
label: None

sentence:
Transfer of Personal Data Between Countries

Apple products and offerings connect you to the world.
label: None

sentence: To make that possible, your personal data may be transferred to or accessed by entities around the world.
label: None

sentence: Apple complies with laws on the transfer of personal data between countries to help ensure your data is protected, wherever it may be.
label: None

sentence: The Apple entity that controls your personal data
label: None

sentence: may differ depending on where you live.
label: None

sentence: For example, retail store information is controlled by individual retail entities in each country and Apple Media Services-related personal data may be controlled by various Apple entities as reflected in the terms of service.
label: None

sentence: If you do not reside in the U.S., your personal data may be processed by Apple Inc. on behalf of the Apple entity controlling personal data for your jurisdiction.
label: None

sentence: For example, Imagery and associated data collected by Apple around the world to improve Apple Maps and to support our Look Around feature is transferred to Apple Inc. in California.
label: None

sentence: Personal data relating to individuals in the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom, and Switzerland is controlled by Apple Distribution International Limited in Ireland.
label: None

sentence: Apple's international transfer of personal data collected in the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom, and Switzerland is governed by Standard Contractual Clauses.
label: None

sentence: Apple’s international transfer of personal data collected in participating Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC)
label: None

sentence: countries abides by the APEC
label: None

sentence: Cross-Border Privacy Rules (CBPR)
label: None

sentence:
Our Companywide Commitment to Your Privacy

To make sure your personal data is secure, we communicate our privacy and security guidelines to Apple employees and strictly enforce privacy safeguards within the company.
label: None

sentence:
Privacy Questions

If you have questions about Apple’s Privacy Policy or privacy practices, would like to contact our Data Protection Officer, or would like to submit a complaint, you can contact us at apple.com/legal/privacy/contact or call the Apple Support number for your country or region.
label: None

sentence: You can also ask us questions about how to submit a privacy complaint and we will endeavor to help.
label: None

sentence: Apple takes your privacy questions seriously.
label: None

sentence: A dedicated team reviews your inquiry to determine how best to respond to your question or concern, including those inquiries received in response to an access or download request.
label: None

sentence: In most cases, all substantive contacts receive a response within seven days.
label: None

sentence: In other cases, we may require additional information or let you know that we need more time to respond.
label: None

sentence: Where your complaint indicates an improvement could be made in our handling of privacy issues, we will take steps to make such an update at the next reasonable opportunity.
label: None

sentence: In the event that a privacy issue has resulted in a negative impact on you or another person, we will take steps to address that with you or that other person.
label: None

sentence: If you are not satisfied with Apple’s response, you may refer your complaint to the applicable regulator.
label: None

sentence: If you ask us, we will endeavor to provide you with information about relevant
label: None

sentence: complaint avenues which may be applicable to your circumstances.
label: None

sentence: When there is a material change to this Privacy Policy, we’ll post a notice on this website at least a week in advance of doing so and contact you directly about the change if we have your data on file.
label: None
